screensaver.name: xscreensaver-movies
screensaver._description: This Python script plays video files as a screen saver. The list of directories where this script looks for video files is set here. This is a comma delimited string. If there are any spaces in the string, xscreensaver-demo will mangle the string and prevent this script from working properly. Example of a good string: "/video/directory_1,/directory_2,/directory3"
